item.description:
Dear Improvisers,

If you've joined Laughing Matter and have been itching to participate as a community service performer, come to this rehearsal! This will be a chance for new members to meet the current cast, do warmups and drills together, and learn a few improv games. You can also hear about the cast's premiere performance at Somerville Home!

Please read through the following website before arriving: http://greenlightwiki.... The site contains helpful guidelines and suggestions about improvisation. Of course, this is just a primer. Most of our learning comes by doing.

Hope to see you all make it out!
Harish

group.name: Great Boston Chapter of Laughing Matter - Auditions Circle

item.name: Casting Call for All Members
